title: threat intelligence feeds
extract: Threat intelligence feeds are a continuous stream of threat data such as the IOCs. As the name suggests, these feeds are to be fed to technologies like SIEM. Feeds are a result of latest and potential threats and attacks happening globally.Jul 4, 2018
extract_html: Threat intelligence feeds are a continuous stream of threat data such as the IOCs. As the name suggests, these feeds are to be fed to technologies like SIEM. Feeds are a result of latest and potential threats and attacks happening globally.Jul 4, 2018
